span.strong: School Building Aid – Letter of Intent

span.span: Testimony to NH Senate Finance Committee

a.strong: Facility Reports and Board Presentation from Harriman Architects

div.h6: Our board members are happy to address your questions or concerns. Feel free to call any member at the phone numbers listed. If you wish to have an issue presented at a board meeting, please put your concern in writing and send it to the Superintendent’s attention at the SAU office. The inclusion of items suggested by citizens shall be at the discretion of the chair of the board and in compliance with policy BEDB.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8311 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-allenstown category-chichester category-deerfield category-epsom category-news category-pembroke category-sau

h2.a: 2020 NH Special Education Administrator of the Year

article.p: by ksutphen | Jan 3, 2020 | Allenstown, Chichester, Deerfield, Epsom, News, Pembroke, SAU

div.p: At its December 13th, 2019 meeting, the NH Association of Special Education Administrators (NHASEA) announced that Ms. Karen Guercia is the 2020 recipient of the NH Special Education Administrator of the Year. Ms. Guercia is the Assistant Superintendent of Student...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-8278 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-allenstown category-news

img.alt: Principal Czerula Makes AES Students Day!

h2.a: Principal Czerula Makes AES Students Day!

div.p: Principal Ginelle Czerula kissed a real pig as an incentive for the Scholastic Book Fair. Students at Allenstown Elementary School loved it!

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8024 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-allenstown category-jobs-openings category-news

h2.a: Food Service Openings – Allenstown School District

article.p: by ksutphen | Jun 10, 2019 | Allenstown, Job Openings, News

div.p: Food service workers are needed at Allenstown Schools for 2019-2020 school year. Two positions are available. Please send application (found at www.sau53.org), resume and letter of interest to Sylvia Grant, 30 S. Main Street, Allenstown, NH 03275 or...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8019 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-allenstown category-jobs-openings category-news
article.p: by ksutphen | Jun 10, 2019 | Allenstown, Job Openings, News

div.p: Allenstown School District is seeking a part-time Title 1 Teacher for the 2019-20 school year. A certified teacher is needed to instruct K-8 students in an intervention model. The position has a data component that involves data team leadership. The schedule and...

School Administrative Unit 53

div.class: widget-odd widget-last widget-first widget-1 fwidget et_pb_widget widget_text
widget-odd widget-last widget-first widget-1 fwidget et_pb_widget widget_text

strong.em: The SAU 53 Central Office strives to facilitate and support the work of all schools, their faculty, staff, and boards in our shared commitment to provide a quality education to all students.
Our office values a pleasant, positive work environment, building good relationships, and the promotion of best practices in business and educational leadership.
